document_title: Stevens Johnson syndrome (SJS): Causes, signs, treatment
subsection_content: All drugs have the risk of causing allergies to varying degrees. Therefore, if after taking the medicine you see signs of itching or skin rash, you should stop taking the medicine promptly and re-examine immediately for specific advice from a doctor. This helps patients avoid the risk of facing serious complications, even death.
